name: Scripts/MKW-Randomizer.Rmd
content:
Loading Libraries etcccc

```{r}
library(tidyverse) # general packages with lots of functions
library(here) # for file paths with the project as root
library(reactable) # for interactive tables
```

```{r}
# Loading the data
tracks <- read_excel(here::here("data/ultimate-MKW-randomizer-spreadsheet.xlsx"))
# Selecting the relevant columns
tracks <- tracks %>% select(Track, Type, Rating)
# Making an interactive table
reactable::reactable(tracks)
# Changing the column types
tracks <- tracks %>%
  mutate(
    Track = as.character(Track), # convert Track to character
    Type = as.factor(Type),       # convert Type to factor
    Rating = as.factor(Rating)   # convert Rating to factor
  )
# checking the types
#str(tracks)
```

```{r}
# Define your percentage lookup table for each rating tier
pct_lookup <- c("S+" = 58, "S" = 16.5, "A" = 15, "B" = 9, "C" = 1, "D" = 0.5)

# Function to pick tracks based on weighted probabilities
pick_tracks <- function(tracks, pct_lookup, n = 1) {
  tracks$pct <- pct_lookup[as.character(tracks$Rating)]
  if (any(is.na(tracks$pct))) {
    warning("Some ratings are missing from pct_lookup.")
  }
  sample_indices <- sample(nrow(tracks), n, replace = FALSE, prob = tracks$pct)
  tracks[sample_indices, ]
}
```

#############################################################
#                   R A N D O M I Z E R                     #
#############################################################

```{r}
# Example usage: pick 5 tracks
picked_tracks <- pick_tracks(tracks, pct_lookup, n = 8)
print(picked_tracks)
```
